author: andresfelquintero
body:
#### PR description: This update was based on what was discussed on the following JIRA ticket https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSTZ-427 

<!-- runPromptReco.py in test folder was updated, because it did not take the number of cores/threads into consideration to create configuration files. -->

#### PR validation:

<!-- No new unit tests were created, it was tested on a local environment and will complete a wrapper-->

title: Updated runPromptReco.py
